sections.title: Details
content: It is a Slam poetry Competition.

sections.title: Guidelines
content: Each contestant performs for 2 minutes maximum.
Themes may include storytelling , poetry ,stand-up, shayaris , monologue , a lyrical performance ( poem with an instrument as a prop)
The organisers will contact the participants only via the email address and contact numbers given during registration.
2-3 minutes per contestant, each performing a different set from the elimination round.
4 judges will provide feedback and scores.
Themes may include story telling , poetry ,stand-up, shayaris , monologue , a lyrical performance ( poem with an instrument as a prop).
